name: Holiday 2023 Promotion
description: Special holiday promotion for premium customers with personalized offers based on interests
subject: Exclusive Holiday Offers Just For You, {{first_name}}!
template_html:
Hello {{first_name}},

We've curated special holiday deals just for you based on your interests in {{custom_attributes.interests.0}} and {{custom_attributes.interests.1}}.

As a valued premium member since {{custom_attributes.membership_since}}, you get an additional 15% off with code: HOLIDAY2023

Click here to view your personalized offers.

Happy Holidays!
The Marketing Team
template_text:
